org.htwk.graphplot.expression

Class OperationInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.htwk.graphplot.expression.OperationInformation

  • public class OperationInformation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is supposed to hold information about an interpretable operation.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sophie Eckenstaler, René Martin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OperationInformation(java.lang.Class<? extends Operation> operationClass, java.lang.String operationString, Operation.OperationImportance operationImportance)
      Initializes a object which holds information about a class extending Operation.
